name: Exient OPUS File
summary: Learn about .XOPUS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Opus is an audio coding format developed by the Xiph.Org Foundation. It is an open, royalty-free format that features lossy compression.

description: An XOPUS file contains a raw Opus audio stream used by a game with the Exient XGS Engine, such as Angry Birds Go! or Angry Birds Transformers. It stores audio referenced by the game for music or sound effects.
